trans-unit.source: One With the Wild (6 Intellect points) #Ability #CureAbility #MetaAbility #Mid #Core
trans-unit.target: One With the Wild (6 Intellect points) #Ability #CureAbility #MetaAbility #Mid #Core

trans-unit.source: For the next hour, natural animals and plants within long range will not knowingly harm you or those you designate. In addition, your Might Edge, Speed Edge, and Intellect Edge increase by 1, and if you make any recovery rolls during this period, you recover twice as many points.
trans-unit.target: For the next hour, natural animals and plants within long range will not knowingly harm you or those you designate. In addition, your Might Edge, Speed Edge, and Intellect Edge increase by 1, and if you make any recovery rolls during this period, you recover twice as many points.
